nws_periods.name: Today
nws_periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms after 7am. Mostly sunny, with a high near 90. Northeast wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nws_periods.shortForecast: Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Partly Cloudy
nws_periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 10pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 72. Northeast wind 0 to 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.
